original_text:
(though the father has done none of them):
“He eats at the mountain shrines.
He defiles his neighbor’s wife.
korean_text: 산 위에서 제물을 먹거나 이웃의 아내를 더럽히거나

sentences.original_text: though the father has done none of them
sentences.korean_translation: 아버지는 그것들 중 어느 것도 행하지 않았지만

sentences.original_text: He eats at the mountain shrines
